El juego esta muy bueno, si juegas con amigos es mucho mas divertido incluso. El único problema es que el Director del juego es un incompetente que no sabe ni jugar a su propio juego. Hace años que esta desbalanceadisimo a favor de los supervivientes y la comunidad es una mierda. Pero bueno, en terminos generales, es un buen juego.
Great game with a huge learning curve so you can spend hours on this game and still enjoy it!

i love this game but there are a lot of problems that come with it i have been getting a load of terrible survivors as of late and then suddenly the next day ill be given a survivor with 2000 plus hours this is the mmr system but i hate it one second you will find yourself getting really bad players then the next you will find yourself with a really good player most likely better then you its not a mmr system but thats not the only thing i dislike about dbd i have been getting a lot of hackers in my lobby recently so i have needed to dc (i dont trust playing in a hackers lobby) but i have been getting a lot of time outs and im losing my rank points from that i wish i they would turn the leaving the game is fine again or at least give me my points back after they do something about the 2 hackers i reported dont install this game expecting a whole lot of fun cus this game is a bit of a mess and its fun and all maybe a bit addicting but its annoying so thats my review for this game i only recemmend this to people who are fine with getting hackers and a whole lot of lag lobbys but otherwise i know its stupid i still say its good. (edit) just a week after making this i have gotten 4 hacker lobbys and have lost 3 points to my rank in 1 match cus of these hackers i dont think i can take these stupid matchs anymore i do not think you should install dbd at all it is a very annoying game and its pretty dumb.

After many hours playing this game, i can say i do not recommend it, at least not anymore. 


I wanna start off by saying Dead by Daylight has the most entitled and toxic fan base. The gameplay will get super repetitive, and solo-queue is one of the most frustrating experiences you will ever have. So if you are not  going to be playing with friends, prepare yourself to be f'd time and time again by either your teammates or the killer.

Yes, the Dead by Daylight has always bin toxic. But after playing this game for a 1,5 years i can see allot of change. The survivors being extremely rude over something the killer did or the other way around. Or bringing up the perks and items they brought because they where to "meta". 
Due to the fact, that people are leaving, the queues are overwhelmingly long. Once you've finally entered a match, to then be immediately tunnelled, camped and killed or be genrushed, it ruins the entire experience and leaves a bad taste in your mouth. There's nothing wrong with this play style, but when the games are shorter than the queues, people never get a chance to learn/play and as a result become toxic and short tempered. 
DBD is very micro-transition dependant in order to get the full experience and to be able to compete with other players due to some powerful perks being behind a pay wall of dlc (decisive strike, deliverance etc), although you can make a strong build which will be sufficient for survivor, although on killer some essential perks are locked behind the dlc and are needed.

I also wanna bring up that BHVR doesnt really listen to the community, the devs seem to have a horrible time in balancing anything.

Besides all of that, i did have allot of fun playing this game, met allot of amazing people trough dbd and im very thankful for that. If you know you are going to play this game with friends, then yes. I would recommend this game! With allot of special promotions where the game is on sale for like -60%, i'd say get it.

The game is alright. Many pros like the DLC characters from horror franchises that make the game unique. But the players (both killer and survivors) can be very annoying (gameplay-wise and sportsmanship-wise). When compared to the very similar "Friday the 13th: The Video Game", the game is much more grindy and terrifying, but not as fun as FT13 when playing with friends. Overall, 6/10.

В этой игре почти все зависит либо от скилла, либо от доната ибо без него твоя задница улетит не просто на луну а на марс пока ты будешь копить на очередного донатного вышившего или маньяка. Ставлю 4 из 10 вылетевших майерсов

Dead by Daylight ist ein asymmetrisches Multiplayer Horror Spiel von Behaviour Interactive.
Seit dem Release im Jahr 2016 habe ich immer wieder in das Spiel reingeschaut und es erhält bis heute (5 Jahre nach Release) regelmäßige Content Updates.
Das besondere an Dead by Daylight ist der asymmetrische Multiplayer bei dem vier Überlebende gegen einen übermächtigen Killer versuchen müssen zu überleben und vom Aufenthaltsort zu entkommen. Um das zu schaffen müssen sie in einer Runde eine bestimmte Anzahl an Generatoren aktivieren um anschließend durch eins der zwei großen Ausgangstore zu entkommen. 
Dabei ist jeder Überlebende mit vier einzigartigen Perks ausgestattet welche man durch das Spielen oder kaufen von Charakteren freischalten kann. Diese Perks bringen verschiedenste Vorteile zum Beispiel das Anzeigen der Generatoren beim Spielstart oder ein kurzer Sprintboost.
Der Killer hingegen hat eine spezielle Fähigkeit die ihn auszeichnet und welche er mit seinen Perks verbessern kann. Seine Aufgabe ist es alle Überlebenden zu fangen und an die auf der Map verteilten Haken aufzuhängen.
Eine weitere Besonderheit von Dead by Daylight sind die verschiedenen Lizenzen. So gibt es etliche Killer und Überlebende von Horror Filmen wie Scream, Saw oder Texas Chainsaw Massacre aber auch von anderen Videospielen des Horror Gerne wie Resident Evil oder Silent Hill.
Bemängeln kann ich eigentlich nur die manchmal sehr hohen Wartezeiten bis man eine Lobby findet.
Für Zwischendurch ist Dead by Daylight immer wieder gut und meist auch verdammt lustig.
Von mir gibt’s eine klare Kaufempfehlung!

Very fun game, if played right.
At the start it´s going to be a hard time, but once you have the hang of it it´s pretty fun.

There are a few smaller things that can be annoying, like hit validation but overall it´s really fun.
Sadly there are MANY toxic people on this community, and even tho it´s not really the fault of the dev team i´m gonna give  a negative review, because ultimately you want to have fun, but getting caught once and then camped till death really takes the fun away.
